The incident at issue involved a single operator performing cleaning operations on top of a dump truck without personal fall protection equipment. Bridger Coal Company immediately completed actions to abate the concern and on the same day, the Federal Mine Safety and Health Administration terminated the section&nbsp;107(a) order.
